Package com.bitsavior.entity

Class MovingEntity

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.entity.Entity
com.bitsavior.entity.MovingEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollision
Direct Known Subclasses:
AntiBug, Bug, Player
public class MovingEntity
extends Entity
implements ICollision
a moving entity controls the moving behaviour and the moving animations. A moving entity extends an entity and implement a collision interface for collision detection

  • Constructor Details

    • MovingEntity

      public MovingEntity​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, float velocity, int colums, int rows, float frameDuration)
      constructor
      Parameters:
      texture - : texture of the entity
      velocity - : velocity of the entity
      colums - : colums of the used spritesheet(for animation)
      rows - : rows of the used spritesheet(for animation)
      frameDuration - : sets the duration of one animation frame

  • Method Details

    • move

      protected void move​(int inversion, float Delta)
      sets the coordinates of the entity accordingly to the given direction
      Parameters:
      inversion - : 1 for the normal direction, -1 for the inverse direction
      Delta - : elapsed time since last frame

    • isCollided

      public boolean isCollided​(Entity entity)
      check if enemy collided with the given entity
      Specified by:
      isCollided in interface ICollision
      Parameters:
      entity - : collision to be checked with
      Returns:
      : returns true if a collision happened

    • update

      public void update​(float Delta)
      updates the animation logic Notice: if this class is inherited by another class, this function must be called in the update function of the child
      Parameters:
      Delta - : time since last frame in milliseconds

    • isCollided

      public void isCollided​(Tilemap map)
      check object layer of the map if a collision happened
      Parameters:
      map - : map with the collideable objects to check

    • draw

      public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, float Delta)
      draw the current animation with the given rotation
      Overrides:
      draw in class Entity
      Parameters:
      batch - : current SpriteBatch for drawing
      Delta - : elapsed time since last frame

    • isRecentlyCollided

      protected boolean isRecentlyCollided()
      gets back if the entityy is recently collided(since the last frame)
      Returns:
      : true if collided since the last frame, false if not collided since the last frame
